scripts.build: vite build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const buildDir='public/build/assets';const cssFiles=fs.readdirSync(buildDir).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.css'));if(cssFiles.length){fs.copyFileSync(path.join(buildDir,cssFiles[0]),'public/css/app.css');console.log('CSS copied to public/css/app.css');}"
